div.p:
Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene Tenta in pretorio eiusdem decimo
quarto die mensis Julij Anno Dominj quo supra et cetera

The said' day Williame blakhal of that Ilk forspekar for angus William
sone proponit ande allegijt that thomas Waus ane' of the bailyeis of
the said' burgh' wrangfully put the said' Angus in the tolbutht and'
askit the saide thomas to be removit out of Jugement Callande
him ane' pretendit bailye in ane fensit cowrt

The said day Thomas Waus complenyeit that William blakhall off
that Ilk haid tribulit him in ane' fensit cowrt the quhilk the
said' Willaim denyit And' thareftir the said' actioun was put to the
decisioun of ane assis' Quhilkis riply auisit the greit aith suorn'
said' and deliuerit be moutht of Alexander gray forspekar of the said assis'
that the saide William blakhale haid tribulit the said' thomas Waus
bailye calland' him ane' pretendit bailye in ane' fensit court ffor
the quhilk the said' William was in ane' amerciament of the court tile
amend' as law wile and forbeir in tyme to cum quhilk was gevin for
dome

The said' day Duncane Colisone bailye requirit Williame blakhall
of that Ilk forspekar admittit for angus Williamsone tile ansueir for
the said' angus for tribulance done to Johnne logane Cremar castin
his geir in the dub The quhilk refusit tile ansueir And' Normund'
leslie ane' of the officiaris of the said' burgh at the command' of the saide
bailye chargit the said' William anis twis' thris' with his wand' of
office tile ansueir for the said' tribulance And' elikwis' he chargit
the said anguis anis twis' thris' tile ansuer for the said' tribulance
twichand' him with the said wand' Quhilkis William and Anguis wald'
nocht ansuer ffor the quhilkis the said officiar brek his wand' of office
apone' the said' William and' angus

The said' day Duncane Collisone bailye Continewit the actioun' betuix
Angus Williamsone and' Johnne logane quhil monunday next to cum
for waiknes of the Court and' furnes' of the day

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene Tenta in pretorio eiusdem decimo
sexto de mensis Julij Anno Dominj quo supra et cetera

The said' day Comperit Johnne Currour and' Johnne Waul mastiris
vndir god of tua Inglis' schippis of scarisburgh witht Certane fischar
men And' patry leslie thair forspekar ande huimly complenyeit how thai
happinnit til arv ariwe and' cum within the hawin and' port of the
said' burgh be ane northt eist wind' and' lekues' of ane' of thair
said' schippis one sounday in the morning the xv day of this Instant
moneth of Julij And' ser Johnne ruthirfurd' and androw fif with thair
complicece haid takin thaim allegiand' thai suld be presoneris Ande
deponit the greit aitht that thai com' within the said' havin to mend' the
said' schip and throw ane' north est wind' and' askit leif at the quhit
fischearis or thai com' within the said' havin quhilk licent thame safer as
thai mycht And' besocht the bailyes to grant thame Certificacioun' thair
apone And' thareftir the bailyeis causit the belman to pas' throw the
toun' and' warne the merchandis and' nychtburis of the toun' to cum to the
tolbutht til haue thair awis' in the said' mateir Quhilkis present ande
Circuly inquirit be William scrimgeour ane' of the said officiaris of the said'
burgh grantit and' declarit that thai consentit nocht to the takking of
the said schippis and' personis Nor haid' nocht art nor part tharof and' thai
vndirstude thai var na presoneris and' requirit the bailyeis to gif the said'
Inglismen Certificacioun' tharapone' Protestand' that quhat skaith happin
nit to cum tharof eftirwart suld' nocht cum one thame na the said' toune
bot apone thaim that w Intromettit witht the said' schipis and persovnis

Curia balliuorum burgj de Abirdene Tenta in pretorio eiusdem
xvijo die mensis Julij Anno Dominj millesimo quingentesimo nono et cetera

The said' Androw brabner grantit him avand' to Duncane
of fyf sex s' The quhilk Normund' of leslie at the command'
of the bailyeis chargit him to pay within terme of lawe et cetera

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene Tenta in pretorio eiusdem vicesimo
die mensis Julij anno Dominj quingentesimo nono

The said' day the bailyeis assignit monunday next to cum to richarde
litster to ansueir to the borgh fundin one him be Walter Cullane
for the wranguis' withhalding fra him of xxviij s' to Compt
and rekinning .

The said' day Waltir howisone grantit him awande tua s' to
Dauid straloche quhilk the bailyeis chargit him to pay within
terme of lawe

The said' day the bailyeis assignit monunday next to cum to Alexander
mathousone to ansuer to the borgh fundin one him be Waltire
howisone for the wranguis' withhalding fra him of xxij s' of
the mail of ane' barne To the quhilk he suld' haue ansuerit this day
vndir hoip of Concord' and' give thai concord' nocht betuix this ande
monunday the said' Alexander sal ansueir to the said' borgh one
the said' monunday

The said day ser thomas bynne grantit that he pundit Johnne
Andirsonis lande lyand' in the gallowgait anent the gray freris
for ane anuel rent of tua merkis aucht til him as chaplane
of sanct michaelis altair eftir the tenour of ane' chartir schawin
tharapone and' grantit he haid' the pundis tharof

The saide daye Norrmunde leslie officiar sueir the greit aitht
ande offerit him' to preive that thomas leslie ane' of the bailyeis
of the said' burgh gaif him command' to pas' with ser thomas bynne and
se him punde Johnne Andirsonis land' lyand' in the gallougait for
tua merkis of annuel aucht to him

The saide' daye thomas leslie bailye denyit that he gaif nor
mund' leslie command' to punde for the annuel of tua merkis aucht
to ser thomas bynne of the said' Johnis land' bot for to pund'
for the relewing' of mage quhit

The said' day Willaime chesame grantit that he sauld' viij
barrel of flour to Donald' baxtair Ande haid resauit compleit
contentacioun ande payment of the samyn

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene Tenta in pretorio eisudem vice
simo primo die mensis Julij Anno Dominj millesimo quingentesimo nono

The saide day Johnne malisone grantit that he and' Johnne reide sellit
ane last of flour to Wilyeam chesame and' Johnne fechat fre one
burde Ande haid resauit payment thairfor

The said' day Jonne malisone grantit that he saw half ane' last of
flour deliuerit to Willaime chesame four barrel on' the key ande tua
send' til his hous' Ande he deliuerit nane of thame

The said' day Johnne malisone grantit that he saw Johnne fichat
schaw Wilyeam chesame to the merk of calk apone four barrellis
of flour forsaid' And' thareftir the said' Williame merkit thame
witht his awin merk And' the said' Johne met tua of the saide
barrellis tursand' to the said' Williamis hous' be the pynouris and
he sperit quahr thai var gangand' with the said' flour And' thai said
thai war tursande the saide flour to Wilyeam chesamis hous'
send' be the marinaris

The said' day Androw Waus mastir of the saide schip grantit that
he gat na fraucht fra Williame chesame bot for half ane'
last of flour

The said' daye Comperit Johnne ancheir franchman with guilyeam
his forspekar ande offerit him reddy til ansuer to Johnne
Arthour in ale thingis that he haid til oppone agains him
And' becaus' the said Johnne Arthour comperit nocht he protestit
for costis skathis and' expensis ande to be quyt of his clame
quhile he be nevlie persewit

The said' day the prouest ande bailyeis assignit monunday that next
cumis to Johnne malisone ande Johnne reid to warrande half ane'
last of flour sauld' be thame to Wilyeam chesame Ande chargit
Williame scrimgeour to warne thame to the said' day to heir thame
to be adiugit to warrand' the said flour to the said Williame

Curia Balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem vicesimo
tercio die mensis Julij Anno quo supra

The said' day Johnne ancheir franchman grantit him weil content
ande fullely pait be the handis of Johnne Arthour burges of the saide
burgh of ale ande sundrie merchandice bocht and resauit fra him ande
specialy of ane' Certane salt Of the quhilkis he dischargis ande
quietclamis the saide Johnne arthour his ayris executouris ande assignes
for him his ayris executouris amd assignes now ande for euir

The saide daye Comperit ser Johhne ruthirfurde knycht exponit ande
schew how he was informit that thomas Waus ande Duncane Coli
sone tua of the bailyeis of the saide burgh haid givin certficacioune to
the Inglismen vndir thair selis in contrar him Requirande thame to schew
him the forme ande tenour of the samyne Quhilkis ansuerit that It vas
in thair comone buk ande he desirit til heir the samyn rede Quhilk oppin
ly rede in the Court the saide ser Johnne allegijt the saide certificacioune
false ande ale the poyntis contenit in It Ande askit ane' day to be assignit
til him that he mycht preif the saide Certificacioune false ande ale the
poyntis contenit in the samyne Ande thai assignit him friday that next
cumis til his saide preif witht his awin consent

The said' day Wilyeame Chesame grantit to warrande vij barrel of flour
saulde and deliuerit be him to Donalde baxtair Ande offerit him tile ansuer
to Dauid ruthirfurd' anent half ane' last of flour clamit be the saide Dauid
one the saide Donalde

The said' daye James Colisoune forspekar for Johnne malisone ande John
reide allegijt that the saidis Johnne ande Johnne haide deliuerit to
Wilyeame chesame half ane last of flour eftir the tenour of thair
condicioun' of selling Ande the prouest ande bailyeis assignit friday
that next cumis to the saidis Johnne ande Johnne to preif thar saide'
allegiance

The said' daye the actioun' persewit be Dauid ruthirfurd' aganis Donald' baxtair
anent sex barrel of flour Is continewit with consent of baitht the said parteis
to friday that next cumis witht power to produce' mair witnes in the
said' actioun be the said' Dauid give he thinkis expedient

The saide day It was deliuerit be ane assis' Alexander gray forspekar that
the borgh fundin be Waltir Cullane one richart litster is of awaile
ande the saide richart sale pay to the saide Waltir xxviij s' within
xv dais eftir the tenour of the saide borgh or ellis to preif It pait

The said' daye It was deliuerit be ane suorne assis' James Collisone'
forspekar that the borgh fundin one' Alexander mathousone be Waltir hovi
sone for the wranguis withhalding fra him of xxij s' for the
maile of ane barne quhilk he hais of the said' Waltir in tak of
awaile Alsua findis that the said' Waltir sal finde the saide Alexander
ane' sufficient hous' ande recompens' him safer as he is skathit
It beand' sufficiently previn

Curia Balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem vicesimoseptimo
die mensis Julij Anno Dominj et cetera quingentesimo nono
The said day

The said day Issabele rait the relict' of vmquhile Wilyeam Kymdy constable'
of abirdene and master alexander lausone hir forspekar admittit and affermit
the Prouost and bailyeis Jugis to thame to knaw apone the borgh' strekit
be the said Issabel apone' thomas Wod for the wranguis' Intrometting with
ane thridpart of ane half netht of the raik quhilk the said elizibeth clamit
to pertene to hir be ressone of terce

The said day master alexander lausone forpsekar for Issabel Rait than
present protestit for the copy of the kingis lettrez In Jugment be thomas
Wod in the name' and behalf of Wilyeame Kimdy constable' of aberdene of the
qhilkis lettrez' the prouost and bailyeis decernit the copy to the said Issabel
one hir expens'

Eodem die Issabella Rait relicta quondam Willelmi Kymdy consta
biliarij de Abirdene fecit contituit creauit et nominauit georgium gordoun'
suum sponsium magistrum Johannem lindesay rectorem beate marie ad geor
gium currour et magistrum alexandrum lausone coniunctum et diuisim suos viros
legittimos et Indubitatos procuratores et cetera ad prosequendum thomam Wod pro iniusta
Intromissione terre partis Dimidij Rethis de Raik eidem Issabelle pertinenciis
vt asseritur Et in omnibus alijs actionibus placitis et querelis Ipsam
concernens Promittens se Ratum gratum firmum et stabile et cetera in vberiora
forma procuratorij qua fierj poterit cum clausulis necessariis et oportunis

The said day the Prouost and bailyeis assignit the terme of fourty
dais that is to say the fift day of the monetht of September nixt tocum
to thomas Wod bailye to call his warand' Wilyeame Kymdy constable'
of abirdene to warand' kep and defend' him ane half nethis fischeing
of the raik quhilk he has in assedacioun' of the said Wilyeam becaus the
said thomas allegit tile ane warand' and askit ane day to call the samyn

The said day Comperit patry leslie befor the prouost and bailyeis sittand in Jugment
and exponit and schew how he had producit ane lettre andir our Souerane lordis
signet and deliuerance of the lordis of counsale directit to thame anent the red
of the gawile of ane hous' and ane star pertening to thomas chamer merchand'
with the said patrikis hous' quhilk he is new biggand' Quhilk patry requirit
the said prouost and bailyeis quhat ansuer thai wald' gif him of the said lettrez'
and that thai wal' Indors' thar ansuer apoun' the bak of the samyn Protestand'
solempnitlie that quhat hurt or skaitht he sustenit in the tyme considering his
said hous was to be put vndir ruf suld' turne him to na preiudice

The said day master alexander Rait lausone forspekar for Issabell Rait
protestit quhat costis skaithis dampnis and expensis that scho sustenit throw
the want of ane thridpart of ane half nethis fischeing of the Rait quhilk
thomas Wod had' intromettit with as scho allegeit suld' cum on' the said
thomas to gidder with the principale proffitis of the said thridpart And that the
assignacioun' assignit to the said thomas to cal his warand' suld turn'
hir to na preiudice

The said day the prouest and bailyeis continewit the oppining of the deposiciounes'
of the witnes betuis Wilyeame chesshame and Johnne malisone and Johnne'
reid' to mononday that nixt cummys for waiknes of the court becaus thar
was na wardaris to ward' apone the samyn'

The said day James Colisone forspekar for Johnne malisone protestit that
the deposicioun' of the witnes that had deponit in the actioun' debatable' betuix
Wilyeame chessame and the said Johnne quhilkis was continewit be the
prouost and bailyeis for waiknes of wardaris to mononday suld' haue
siclik strintht force and effect as thai haue this day but ony preiudice
and' als that the absence of Johne reid' suld' nocht hurt the strintht of the deposicionis
of his witnes'

The said day the prouest and bailyeis of thar auctorite continewit the ward'
and dome anent ane barrell of flour betuix Dauid ruthirfurd' and Donald' baxtar'
to thurisday that nixt cummys the secund day of august

Curia Balliuorum burgi de Abirdene Tenta in pretorio vicesimo
octauo die mensis Julij Anno quo supra

The said' day villiame scrimgeour officiare at command' and' charge of the
prouost ande ballies chargit and' varnit Robert vaus Adam fif ande
Erole witht his wand' of office To Compeir befor thame within the
tolbutht this Instant day be tua houris eftir none to ansuer to the instance
of the Inglismen as thai that var in thair schippis ande kepit thame for the
tyme And' ordand' the saidis personis to bring thair complicece being with
thame in the said' schippis as thai vilbe seruit

The said' day Adam veir vas conuict' be ane suorn' assis' Johnne
of mar forspekar for the stribulance of Johnne brekauche
ffor the quhilkis he vas in ane amerciament of the Court til amend'
as lav vil and' forbeir in tyme to cum And' the said Johnne
brekauch vas maid quyt of al tribulance of the said' Adam be
the said assis' Ande attour the assis' ordand' the said' Adam to pay
half ane' pund of vax to the haly blude lycht

The said' day Johnne Colisone forspekar for Johnne'
brekauch said' that he desirit na mendis to be maid for the
tribulance of Johnne brekauch be Adam of fif veyr

Curia balliuoum burgi de Abirdene Tenta in pretorio eiusdem
penultimo die mensis Julij Anno quo supra

The said' daye the bailyeis assignit friday that next cumis to John'
neile to bring Johnne beuerlay witht him to preif hov mekil that
he sud' sel of ane pece of claitht deliuerit be him to villiame
style merchand' to sele Quhilk preif vas referrit to the said' John
beuerlay vitht the consent of baitht the said' parteis

The said' daye the bailyeis assignit this day xv dais to valtir
Cullane to ansuer to the borgh' fundin one him be richarde litster
for the vranguis away taking out of Androv valcaris butht of
xi eln' of mella cl claith and ane half pertenand' to the saide
richarde witht consent of baitht the said' parteis

The said' day the bailyeis of thair autorite continevit the
actioun debatabile beuix Alexander gray ane Johnne of Cullane
to friday that next cumis witht the consent of party

The said' daye Thomas straloch vas conuict' be ane suorne assis' patry
reid' forspekar for the lycht stribulance of valtir saveray ande the
said' Waltir vas conuict' for the stribulance of the said' thomas ffor
the quhilkis Ilkane of thame' vas in ane amerciament of the covrt
ande tile amend' til vthiris as lav vile

The saide daye Johnne buchane baxtar vas conuict' be ane suorn' assis'
patry reid' forspekar for the tribulance of valtir saveray and'
the saide Waltir for tribulance of the said' Johnne ffor the quhilkis
Ilkane of thame vas in ane amerciament of the covrt tile amend' as
law wile And' attour the said' assis' ordand' the said' Johnne buchan'
to pay half ane pund' of vax to the haly blud lycht'

The said' day richarde reidheid vas maid quyt be ane' suorn'
assis' patry reid forspekar for the tribulance of walter saverayr

The said day Comperit patry leslie befor gilbert menyeis prouost
and the bailyeis sittand' in Jugment for the tyme and requirit thame to
gif him ansuer' of the kingis lettrez' present be him to thame' betuix him and
thomas chamer or thane tile Indors' thar ansuer' vppoun' the said lettrez'
quhilkis grantit that thai suld' Indors' the said lettrez' and gif him

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene Tenta in pretorio eiusdem
tercio die mensis augusti Anno Dominj millesimo quingentesimo nono

The said' daye Williame stile grantit him awand' to Johnne
neile xxvi s' for claith Quhilkis the bailyeis chargit him to
pay within terme of law

The said' daye the bailyeis assignit this day xv dais to Williame
stile to preif that Johnne neile is awand' him four wol skinnis

The said' daye Dauid andirsone grantit that he com soverte
to Williame scrimgeour officiar tile entir Alexander nichol
sone attachit for forstalling of the burgh to Johnne of
mar ane of the denis of gilde Quhilk he entirit to the said'
Johnne in ane fensit court as he allegit and' the said' Johne
command y the said' Williame to keip him And' that he offerit him
to preif Ande previt the samyn that he entirit him this Instant daye
to the said' Johnne of mar be thomas Wode thomas leslie tua of
the bailyeis of the said' burgh and' ser Dauid lyel

The said daye It was fundin be ane suorne' assis' Johnne'
of cullane forspekar that Williame Wormet sal tak doun' his
draucht biggit within his yard' and big It in the tothir sid' of the
samyn yard' within xv dais hereftir And' the said' Johnne sal give
the aid' Willaime tene s' to the bigging of the samyn

The said' day j The borgh obe Dauid Errot one John groswail
franchman for the non Inputting of ane sek of wol pertenand' to
him in the schip was fundin of awaile ffor the quhilk the the
said' francheman was in ane amerciament of the covrt et cetera And aw
to tak out ane sek of the said' schip of ane that Is na frauchtis
man And' input ane sek of the Dauidis in the samyn

The said' daye It was fundin ande deliuerit be an suorn' assis'
Johnne of Cullane forspekar that Johnne Arthour sal pay Cristy
prat the rest of sex pundis awing to him extending to lvij
s' et vj d' scottis money within terme of law And' the said'
Cristy sal Act him in the covrt buk of the said' burgh to keip
the said' Johne skaithles' at ale handis quhom' It efferis anent
the said' sovme And' in continent the said' Criste oblist him be the faith
of his body to keip the said' Johnne skathles of the said money

The said' daye thomas storour grantit him awand' in his vifis
name xxviij s' and viij d' to Johnne Watsone burges of elgene for malt
To be pait within xv dais thareftir

The said' daye Duncane Craik allegijt that Simone Ellone
haid forgivin ande renuncit to him thre franch crovnis quhilkis
he aucht him in recompens' of part of payment of ane sek of woll
castin in the sey Ande tuk to preif his said' allegiance one
monunday that next cumis

The said' Johnne Crag grantit that he pait tene s' to Alexander
roch for Johnne reid' quhilk he allovit in his fraucht
Eodem die Willelmus Wobster amerciatur in defectu presencie
Eodem die Johannes in beryhil amerciatur defectu presencie

Vniversis pateat per presentes Nos balliuos Consules et Communitatem Burgj
de Abirdene fecisse constituisse et ordinasse necnon tenorem presencium facere
constituere et ordinare nostros predilectos burgenses gilbertum menyeis
nostrum prepositum Johannem ruthirfurd' militem Johannem Cullane Andream
Cullane et Johannem Collisone nostros viros et legittimos commissarios
dans et concedens eisdem nostram plenariam potestatem ac mandatum speciale
pro nobis et nomine nostro terras nostras de Kingis Wellis cum suis
pertinenciis Jacente infra libertatem dicti burgi vicinis nostris pluribus aut
firmam dimittere Ceteraque omnia alia et singula faciendum gerendum
et excercendum in premisse que facere possesmus Promittens nostros ratum gratum
missisij in premisse nomine nostro rite duxerunt faciendum In Cuius rej
Testimonium presentibus sigillum nostrum commune est appensum Apud dictum burgum
xxjo die mensis maij Anno Dominj millesimo quingentesimo nono
